title: How to Find a Good Deal on a New Tesla - Lots of Excess Inventory!
description:
Browse here: https://lon.tv/teslalink (compensated affiliate link) - Every couple of years Tesla experiences a glut of inventory and slashes prices on inventory models. In this video I'll show you how to look for a deal and talk about how I feel Tesla's customer service model could be improved. See more cars: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvaeEZf0ScXB0z4EBvRGZrD and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:30 - Inventory Page
02:33 - Sorting
03:48 - Order Process
05:27 - Model S Demo Models and Mid Year Refresh
07:24 - Self-Driving Transfer Option / Used Deals on FSD
09:04 - Conclusion
